name: Dick's Store
description:
You are off to buy some snacks, nothing fancy here. Maybe you'll get a couple of explosively tasty ones, maybe even fall and die for some sodi pops? Oh by the way, watch for rocks on the way out, they tend to ruin your day.

Credits:

I made this game on a week's time, so it's no surprise that Martin Bremer came in super clutch with his dope coding skills, he guided me through and helped set up the code that makes a few of the animations in the game happen, so huge thanks to him.

Follow him on Twitter @MartinBremer91

Hey by the way, this games was fun to make, so if you want some more of whatever I do/make maybe holla' at me in some of this pages.

Made by:

Ian Klaere Fernandez

University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Games a Week"  (SummerSemester 2020)
